summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of an entity named "Gay." The documents primarily concern the payroll records of staff members of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). The documents include payroll authorization forms, memoranda, and notifications from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding the postponement of releasing Social Security numbers from these records. The staff members mentioned are Patricia M. Orr, Jacqueline Hess, and S. Jonathan Blackmer.
significance: Based on the provided documents, the entity "Gay" has no significance in the JFK context.
